org.codefarm.engine

Interface CodeFarmInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeFarmBackEnd

    public interface CodeFarmInterface
    Demo interface for the Back End object to implement. Provides the spec of the interface as set out in the Interface Requirements Specification (IRS)
    Author:
    Oliver Thomas

    • Method Detail

      • getCodes

        java.util.ArrayList<Code> getCodes(int n,
                                 int frontEndId,
                                 int codeSpaceId)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets some codes from a Registered Code Space and returns them as an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        n - The number of codes to get
        frontEndId - The Front End that has the Code Space
        codeSpaceId - the Code Space ID of the Code Space to get the codes from
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the returned Code objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Front End ID or the Code Space ID are not found

      • getCodeSpaceById

        CodeSpace getCodeSpaceById(int frontEndId,
                         int codeSpaceId)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the CodeSpace object specified by codeSpaceId
        Parameters:
        frontEndId - The front End ID to get
        codeSpaceId - The Code Space ID to get
        Returns:
        the CodeSpace object with the specified ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the frontEndId doesn't exist or the codeSpaceId doesn't exist

      • getFrontEndById

        RegisteredFrontEnd getFrontEndById(int frontEndId)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the RegisteredFrontEnd specified by frontEndId
        Parameters:
        frontEndId - The front End ID to get
        Returns:
        the RegisteredFrontEnd object with the specified ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the frontEndId doesn't exist

      • registerCodeSpace

        int registerCodeSpace(int frontEndId,
                    int codeLen,
                    char[] excludes)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a Code Space within a Front End and returns a new Code Space ID
        Parameters:
        frontEndId - The ID of the Front End to add the Code Space to
        codeLen - The length of the code that should be used by the CodeFormatter
        excludes - A char array of the characters that should be excluded by the CodeFormatter
        Returns:
        The Code Space ID for the created CodeSpace
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Front End ID is not found

      • registerFrontEnd

        int registerFrontEnd(java.lang.String frontEndName)
        Registers a Front End and returns a new front end ID
        Parameters:
        frontEndName - The name of the Front End to add
        Returns:
        The Front End ID for the created RegisteredFrontEnd
